Text: The game installs and launches, but when I get started on the tutorial and I click on the "square arrows" in order to get to my restaurant an error appears that says "Error opening file SHADER\shadowmi/cubemap+shadow.pso". I click "OK" and the game quits. Help please?

Hi,

  This should fix your problem:

Go to: C:\Program Files\Restaurant Empire 2\shader\shadowmf  and copy all the files in that map. Then go to C:\Program Files\Restaurant Empire 2\shader\shadowmi    and paste the files.

For more information, feel free to contact our (Live) Support: Games4theworld@hotmail.com
